rows.label: tlk42400013_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Friend receive mission direct from
Chairman. Make sure to do good job.

rows.label: tlk42400013_02_msg0002
rows.name:
But even more important than
good job, make sure come back
in one piece.

rows.label: tlk42400013_02_msg0003
rows.name: No dying and making family sad!
